monitoring.title: More about monitoring exchange offices
monitoring.text1: BestChange has collected and structured information on automatic and manual exchange offices of electronic currencies and cryptocurrencies. The information is presented in the form of tables and graphs that display data on exchange rates and reserves of exchange sites. Data about electronic exchangers is continuously updated every 5-8 seconds. The fast update rate ensures that the most up-to-date exchange rates are available, making it much easier to find a profitable exchange office.
monitoring.text2: BestChange was created specifically to make it easy to find the most suitable exchanger. In the interface of our site, there are three options for choosing a currency pair - a table, classic lists and popular directions, you can use the one that is most comfortable for you. For example, using a convenient direction selection table, you can select the desired pair of currencies with two clicks. Compare: if you use drop-down lists - it will take 4 clicks, and when moving from 'popular destinations' you will need only one click.
monitoring.text3: We constantly think about the security of your exchanges, so only the most reliable exchangers are included in our database. Exchangers with a dubious reputation are excluded from our listing. All exchangers presented on BestChange are reliable services that have been comprehensively tested.
monitoring.text4: Our monitoring of exchangers is designed especially for you. We are confident that our site will become your indispensable and permanent assistant. Don't forget to bookmark the site in your browser.

trading.title: Buying and selling cryptocurrency at a bargain price
trading.text1: Despite the more and more massive adoption of cryptocurrencies around the world, it is still impossible to do without fiat money. Cryptocurrency holders increasingly need to regularly sell and buy Bitcoin and other coins. But how to do this, avoiding scammers and not losing money due to an unfavorable exchange rate?
trading.text2: The number of options for exchanging digital money for fiat and vice versa is hugev- the bill for cryptocurrency exchangers and exchanges goes to many hundreds. And everywhere has its own rules, its own problems and its own characteristics, and the exchange rate of the same currency can differ quite significantly. Choosing the best crypto exchange by personally trying each of them is extremely impractical. Again, simply because of their large number. In addition, in the search results, you can stumble upon not the most profitable and safe exchangers, but those that are most actively engaged in their promotion in search engines. It's far from the same.
trading.text3: Fortunately, our BestChange service collects information about all noteworthy cryptocurrency exchangers. In addition to information about the rate of a particular cryptocurrency on each site, we collect user reviews about the security, convenience and honesty of exchangers.
trading.text4: Because to this, you can not only buy or sell cryptocurrencies profitably, but also do it as quickly, safely and simply as possible. And even if we are talking about a significant amount, you will not have any problems - the site also collects data on the financial reserves of each site. So you will know exactly where you can sell all your bitcoins.
trading.text5: Of course, you can not only analyze monitoring data and user opinions, but also leave your feedback. If you didn’t like the service or, on the contrary, you were able to sell Bitcoin with maximum comfort and profit, help others.

header.title: How to contact us
header.paragraph1: We are always happy to answer your questions and listen to your suggestions for improving the BestChange service.
header.paragraph2: <0>We also accept applications for <1>inclusion in the monitoring</1> of new exchange offices.</0>
header.useMail: Use the following address to contact us:

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.paragraph1: Use this form to ask a question, report a problem or bug.
feedback.paragraph2: Please try to make your message as detailed as possible, this will help us solve your problem much faster.
feedback.paragraph3: Also, please check the correctness of the specified email: if you made a mistake in it, we most likely will not be able to respond to your request.

form.checkbox: <0>I give <1>my consent to the processing of personal data</1></0>
form.note: If your question is related to the exchange, please specify the exact address of the site you worked with and the number of your exchange application. Our correspondence will be greatly reduced.
form.success: Thanks! Your message has been sent to the BestChange administration. We will contact you shortly at the specified email address.

socials.title: We are in social networks
socials.paragraph1: Subscribe to our official groups and channels on social networks to always be in touch, as well as receive information and news from the world of electronic money and cryptocurrencies.
socials.paragraph2: Social media communities are exclusively informational resources in which we can offer only primary user support.
socials.paragraph3: The priority channel for our support service is applications sent via the feedback form.
socials.paragraph4: Please direct your questions directly through her.

scammerPage.description: The database of scammers and inadequates is collected by the exchange offices located on our monitoring, while the moderators of the BestChange project do not check the accuracy of the information from the added records in any way.

helper.scammer: An unregistered client has created a request for a Yandex exchange.Money for the Savings Bank. We received the POISON, transferred the BEAC, the next day we received a complaint about the poison that we were thieves, return the money. On the phone, a person comes up with some excuses. Fraudster.
helper.freak: Insults, writes unfounded claims. The translation came in 10 minutes, and he wrote a claim.

table.noData: You have no records of scammers and inadequates

workingWithData.summary: About working with data on fraudsters and inadequates

details.base:
<1>Attention:</1> The database of scammers and inadequates is collected by the exchange offices located on our monitoring, while the moderators of the BestChange project do not check the accuracy of the information from the added records in any way.
 Using the database, you take full responsibility for the possible consequences of denial of service to customers whose details were in the database by mistake.
details.recommendation: We recommend using this section only as an additional check of questionable exchange transactions. The information received should be checked by the operator of the exchange office, and only after that a decision on denial of service can be made.
details.attention: Please note that customers who once showed themselves inadequately in any of the exchange offices can later conduct exchanges without causing problematic situations. It should also be borne in mind that searching for some data, for example, by IP addresses, nicknames and names can often cause false positives, and erroneous additions to the database by administrators of other exchange offices can lead to a significant increase in the number of unjustified refusals to respectable customers, a decrease in the number of completed applications and your income.
details.reject: In case of denial of service to any of the users, we ask you not to refer to the records in this database and not to motivate your refusal by having an entry in the «BestChange fraud database», because your refusal to exchange is completely your decision.
details.variable: An approximate response to a user whose service was denied based on the entries from the section: «According to information from other exchange offices, problematic situations occurred earlier during exchanges with you, so we decided to refuse to cooperate with you. Please contact another exchange office».
details.chapter: By using this section, you agree not to disclose any information received, including not to disclose the facts of the existence of a fraud database and the addition of customer contact details to it. When posting incident records, it is recommended to give as detailed informative descriptions as possible in the «Description» field.When posting entries with the «Fraudster» type, please also post factual information indicating fraudulent actions. In cases where there are no materials indicating fraudulent actions, but you still think that customer service is undesirable, post an entry with the «Inadequate» type and also give a detailed description of the reason for adding the entry.
details.violation: <1>Attention:</1> in case of violations of the terms of use of the fraud database, we reserve the right to disable the exchange offices from the listing for an indefinite time.

details.api: This API allows you to get information from the database of scammers and non-scammers by specified keywords.
details.fetch: A request from the database via the API is carried out by the link:
details.where: <1>where</1> - in which columns to search for the keyword: <1>c</1> - in contacts, <1>d</1> - in the description, <1>cd</1> - in both columns;
details.type: <1>type</1> - among which types to look for: <1>s</1> - among scammers, <1>c</1> - among the inadequate, <1>sc</1> - both types;
details.query: <1>query</1> is a keyword. A query with an empty keyword will return all records from the database.
details.btcAddress: The BTC address of the extortionist who infects the PC with a virus and demands Bitcoins for the password, so the victim of the deception explained to us.

details.addNewScammer: Adding a new fraudster/inadequate API is carried out by the link:

selectionMethods.summary: A selection of ways to independently combat phishing and fraudulent exchangers

phishtank.description: Please note that the site <1>PhishTank.com </1> not available for visiting from Russian IP addresses, use a VPN. To use this service independently, you need several registrations. It is necessary to add a phishing / fraudulent site from one account for verification, and from 4-6 other accounts to vote that it is really phishing. Proof for blocking is not needed, confirmation is based on several votes of other participants of the PhishTank service. It is better to create additional accounts on different IP addresses so as not to arouse suspicion from moderators. After adding and confirming the site is considered phishing and gets into a special database that is used by antiviruses and some browsers to block the site when it is visited.

netCraft.description: It is necessary to write a message in English to e-mail <1>scam@netcraft.com </1> or through <2>a special form</2> (not available from Russian IP addresses, use a VPN) that your site has been cloned and provide links to the original and phishing copy. The answer will be sent to your email. It is better to immediately attach screenshots proving that the sites are the same. The screenshots should show the address bars of the browsers. This is a more serious service, but it blocks only phishing sites (clones) and you need to prove to the moderator that the site is cloned, however, when Netcraft accepts an addition to its database, the phishing site is blocked in Chrome — this is a more significant block, and usually after that scammers drop their clone.

googleChrome.description: While on a phishing site in the Chrome browser, press the Alt+Shift+I key combination, and report phishing in the form that appears.

yandex.description: If a phishing/fraudulent site is indexed in Yandex, please contact it via <2>a special form</2>.

yandexDirect.description: If a phishing site is placed in Yandex contextual advertising, please contact the site through <2>a special form</2>. An additional option: next to the link to the phishing site, click on the green triangle, select "Spam or fraud" in the drop-down menu. With several complaints from different IP addresses and devices, advertising should go to manual moderation.

googleAds.description: If a phishing site is placed in Google contextual advertising, please contact the site through <2>a special form</2>. Click sequentially: Search Ad —> Cyberattack —> Phishing. Following the instructions, you must fill in all the fields.

details.anyOffers: If you have any suggestions for this collection, <2>let us know</2>, we will definitely include them in the list.

generalTips.computer: an antivirus program with operatively updated databases and modules must be installed on the operator's computer.
generalTips.exchanger: The exchange office must use different addresses cryptocurrency wallets for different applications.
generalTips.telegram: For Telegram, pay attention to the user's login (username), and not the user's name (alias). A fraudster can create an account and specify someone else's username in the "name" field. To find out the username of the interlocutor, you should select the function "Show profile".
generalTips.generally: In general, you should be very careful before sending messages, letters, payments, always check all the data (the address of the site where we are, the email address from which the letter came, the email address to which we send the letter, etc.).

debatable.reliability: Reliability is more important than speed: it's better to double-check everything again than to send a payment to a fraudster.
debatable.operator: The operator should be as attentive as possible. Special care should be taken if the user writes with a request to cancel his application and make a refund to other banking details.
debatable.caution: Work with caution with a client who puts pressure on urgency. It is better not to succumb to pressure, but calmly double-check all the data.
debatable.twoUsers: If 2 users are applying for one exchange, it is better to be patient, collect as much information as possible from each and not rush to make a decision (a fraudster can be faster than a real client, it is better to wait for information from both users).
debatable.noIdentify: Not to identify the user as a customer, just because he has information on the application, but to rely on facts. You should not take the user's word for it: if the user writes to other contacts other than those for which correspondence was conducted earlier, you should write to the client on the original contacts and clarify whether he writes from other contacts. If there is no answer for a long time, it is better to wait some more, to pause. A fraudster can find out the client's contacts, application number and other information, for example, if the client has a problem and he wrote a review on monitoring, then the fraudster can create a similar email from which he will write to the exchange office support service.

recommendations.willUpdated: The section will be updated. You can also <2>send us</2> your own recommendations and suggestions for improving the recommendations, we will definitely include them in this text.

paragraph.first: Use this form to ask a question, report a problem or bug.
paragraph.second: Please try to make your message as detailed as possible, it will help us solve your problem much faster.
paragraph.third: Also, please check the correctness of the specified email: if you make a mistake in it, we most likely will not be able to respond to your request.

paragraph.first: Your message has been sent to BestChange administration.
paragraph.second: We will contact you as soon as possible at the email address you provided.

paragraph.first: A prerequisite for the participation of an exchange office in our monitoring is the provision of reliable and up-to-date information on rates, reserves, marks and other important conditions for conducting exchanges that are subject to monitoring.
paragraph.second: If the exchange rate changes in any direction on the website of the exchange office (either the direction is turned off, or the reserve is changed, or an additional/minimum commission is added/removed, etc. conditions), you must immediately update this data in the export rate file, or temporarily exclude directions from the export file so that irrelevant information is not transferred to the monitoring.
paragraph.third: If you have difficulty specifying labels through the export course file, in this section you can manually specify all the necessary labels about minimum, additional commissions and non-automatic exchange.

accordion1.title: How does the affiliate program work?
accordion1.content: By registering in our affiliate program, you get a unique affiliate ID (?p=9784), which is added to all your links and HTML code. You can place links to any pages of the BestChange.ru service on your website, blog, page, communities and social networks. When a visitor attracted by advertising clicks on your affiliate link and goes to us, the system remembers him and automatically registers him as a visitor attracted by you (this means that the client came from you). Once a visitor starts using the site, you earn affiliate rewards. Rewards will “drop” into your account even if you don’t do anything else - and this is forever. You can always see the accrued funds on your account in your partner account, as well as request their withdrawal (limited only by the minimum limit).

accordion2.title: I am a recent PC user. Can you tell me how to copy promotional materials to my website?

accordion3.title: To place a banner, I need an image URL. How to get it?

accordion4.title: How much will I earn by participating in your affiliate program?

accordion5.title: How many levels are in your affiliate program? Is it paid to attract new partners?

accordion6.title: If I put my affiliate link in the signature on the forum, will the transitions and all the conditions of the PP be taken into account?

accordion7.title: Will user referrals be taken into account if I advertise my affiliate link in Skype, WhatsApp, Viber, ICQ, etc. chats?

accordion8.title: Can I advertise my affiliate link on an English site?

accordion9.title: I already have other affiliate programs installed on my site. Can I be your partner?

accordion10.title: I use a link shortener to hide an affiliate link. Is this not a violation?

accordion11.title: Is my site eligible to participate in the affiliate program?

accordion12.title: I am sure that several people followed my link, but the money for them was not credited. Why?

accordion13.title: What does the statistics "Direct referrals" and "From blacklisted sites" mean?

accordion14.title: I followed my affiliate link from another computer, but the number of clicks in my account has not changed. Why?

accordion15.title: How do you track cheaters among partners?

accordion16.title: I can't log in to my partner account. Writes "Wrong combination of login and password." What to do?

accordion17.title: How is the money earned paid out?

accordion18.title: Why is my affiliate account blocked?

accordion19.title: Is it possible to put affiliate links leading directly to the list of exchangers of a certain direction (https://www.bestchange.ru/wmz-to-wmr.html?p=9784)?

attractTab.title: How to attract visitors
attractTab.paragraph1: Here we will talk about all the available ways to advertise an affiliate link and get high-quality paid traffic.
attractTab.paragraph2: The purpose of the affiliate program is to attract visitors interested in purchasing/exchanging cryptocurrency and electronic money. To generate such traffic, we recommend that you talk directly about the BestChange monitoring function, its capabilities and benefits on resources with the target audience.
attractTab.paragraph3: In general, the main thing is that the advertising of our service looks natural, that the information of the partner is really relevant and helps us find users interested in our site. In contrast, spam, that is, mass posting of materials on various Internet resources that do not belong to our field of activity, or persistent intrusive advertising, is strictly prohibited.
attractTab.paragraph4: Other prohibited ways of advertising an affiliate link are listed on the <1>rules</1> page
attractTab.paragraph5: We look forward to mutually beneficial cooperation!

card2.title: Use of social networks
card2.content1: placing an affiliate link in your group
card2.content2: placement of an affiliate link on a personal page
card2.content3: commenting on thematic groups, videos, posts, etc.
card2.content4: recording and uploading your videos to an album
card2.content5: placement of our official videos in the album

card3.title: Communication on the forums
card3.content1: creating a new topic on the forum
card3.content3: indication of an affiliate link in the signatures of your messages

card4.title: Advertising with Youtube
card4.content1: recording and posting your own video review about the service (with an affiliate link in the description under the video)
card4.content2: uploading our official videos to your channel
card4.content3: commenting on thematic videos (currency exchange on the Internet, exchange offices, monitoring of exchange offices, money transfers, various payment systems, etc.) indicating your affiliate link. Commenting on non-thematic videos is spam, which in our affiliate program is punishable by blocking the affiliate account

card5.title:
Commenting 
thematic sites and blogs
card5.content1: You can leave comments on topical articles on websites/blogs. The more organically your comment fits in, the more likely it is that the moderator will approve it. On the contrary, thoughtlessly posting posts with an affiliate link is unlikely to be beneficial, such comments will be deleted.

card6.title: Using Q&A Services
card6.content:
Search for thematic questions and answers to them with your affiliate link. Important:
We recommend using a link shortening service
 <1> bitly.com</1>.

conditionsTab.title: Conditions to partake in partner’s program
conditionsTab.paragraph1:
By registering on the BestChange exchange monitoring site as a partner, you offer
your full agreement with reality and undertake to abide by them.
conditionsTab.paragraph2:
Your income directly depends on a properly built promotion campaign and correct use
advertising materials and text. These texts should tell people in the most accessible and understandable way why
you need the BestChange service and how to exchange cryptocurrency and electronic money with it. Recommended with
from the very beginning, choose the right approach to work, focus on our examples of text materials
and rules, then the income will be the highest.
conditionsTab.li1:
Accruals and payments under the affiliate program are made in USD currency. Withdrawal of partner funds
available in electronic currencies Perfect Money (USD, EUR), Bitcoin, YuMoney, QIWI, Payeer
(USD, EUR, RUB), Advanced Cash (USD, EUR, RUB).
conditionsTab.li2: The minimum amount to withdraw earned money from an affiliate account is <1>$1.00.</1>
conditionsTab.li3: For each <1>unique</1> user you refer, you can get up to <3>$0.65+</3>. The exact amount of charges depends on a number of parameters. The higher the interest of attracted visitors in currency exchange, the more you will receive an accrual.
conditionsTab.li4: Payment for one user consists of several separate charges:
conditionsTab.li5: The first visit of the referred user - <1>$1.00.</1>
conditionsTab.li7: used the monitoring of exchangers, you get <1>$0.01</1> x 9
conditionsTab.li8: returned to the site after 3 days, you get <1>$0.02</1>
conditionsTab.li9: returned to the site after 7 days, you get <1>$0.03</1>
conditionsTab.li10: returned to the site after 14 days, you get <1>$0.04</1>
conditionsTab.li11: returned to the site after 30 days, you get <1>$0.06</1>
conditionsTab.li12: returned to the site after 60 days, you get <1>$0.09</1>
conditionsTab.li13: returned to the site after 90 days, you get <1>$0.13</1>
conditionsTab.li14: returned to the site after 120 days, you get <1>$0.15</1>
conditionsTab.li15: registered as a partner, you get <1>30%</1> of his income
conditionsTab.li16: registered as a partner and attracted another partner, you get <1>10%</1> of the latter's income.
conditionsTab.li17:
These affiliate rewards are subject to change over time. At the same time, everything
the earned funds are kept on the account, taking into account the rates that were in force earlier.
conditionsTab.li18: A user is not considered unique (not taken into account by the system) if:
conditionsTab.li19:
from his IP-address there has already been a transition to the BestChange website using the same affiliate link in
during the last 3 months;
conditionsTab.li20: his browser does not pass the parameter of the address of the page from which the transition was made;
conditionsTab.li21: he is not interested in using the BestChange service;
conditionsTab.li22: he switched only for the sake of registering in an affiliate program;
conditionsTab.li23: he switched just for the «free bonus»;
conditionsTab.li24: the transition was made by the partner himself.
conditionsTab.li27: ask other users to follow affiliate links;
conditionsTab.li28: register more than one affiliate account;
conditionsTab.li29: use any kind of wrap transitions.
conditionsTab.li30: On the page where you publish an affiliate link, it must be clearly indicated about the services provided by the BestChange service. The advertising text must include information on the main service of the BestChange service - the selection of the best rates in the most reliable exchange offices. This information must be at least half of the total advertising content, the texts should not consist of only advertising of the affiliate program and "free bonuses" from BestChange. Also, any <1>deception</1> in the description, urging the user to follow the affiliate link, will lead to <3>blocking</3> affiliate account.
conditionsTab.li31: Allowed: the advertising text contains information only on the main service of the BestChange service;
conditionsTab.li32:
Allowed: the advertising text contains information on the main service of the BestChange service (at least
 half of the advertising text), as well as through an affiliate program;
conditionsTab.li33:
Forbidden: the advertising text contains only information about the affiliate program and/or
 "free bonuses".
conditionsTab.li34: Examples from the <1>Text materials</1> section in your partner account will help you compose an advertising text (the link will be available after authorization).
conditionsTab.li35: It is forbidden to place an affiliate link:
conditionsTab.li36a: in systems of active advertising (ATS), paid viewing of advertising letters, paid tasks and similar systems(
conditionsTab.li37: on sites that use the services of the services from the previous paragraph;
conditionsTab.li38:
in contextual and targeted advertising systems, teaser networks, other buying/selling systems
traffic (AdWords, Direct, Tak, etc.);
conditionsTab.li39: in mass mailings of letters (SPAM), electronic messages in various services, social networks;
conditionsTab.li40:
on sites that forcefully open browser windows (including doorways), or open the site in
hidden frame;
conditionsTab.li41: on sites created only for the purpose of advertising referral links;
conditionsTab.li42: on sites that distribute any materials that directly or indirectly violate the laws of the Russian Federation;
conditionsTab.li43: on web pages that publish lists of sites with <1>"free bonuses"</1> and <3>"BTC faucets"</3> (you can add the BestChange site to such a list, but the link when this should not be affiliated);
conditionsTab.li44:
on web pages closed from public viewing. For example, closed groups and pages in
social networks, closed sections of forums, etc.
conditionsTab.li45: Sites that violate the above rules will be added to the <1>black list</1> of the BestChange affiliate program. Payment for users who come from such sites will not be made.
conditionsTab.li46:
In case of non-compliance with the conditions of the affiliate program, the partner will be denied payments, and
partner account can be blocked without the possibility of recovery.
conditionsTab.li47:
In case of <1>suspicion of cheating</1> affiliate program (creation of
fictitious navigation flow), the administrator reserves the right to:
conditionsTab.li48: ask the partner for <1>screenshots</1> of placed advertising materials;
conditionsTab.li49: request access to <1>visit statistics</1> of sites where advertising materials were placed
conditionsTab.li50: <0>block the account</0> of a partner suspected of cheating, <2>without paying and explaining the reasons.</2>
conditionsTab.li51:
The Partner is fully responsible for the safety of his authentication data (login and
password) to access your account.
conditionsTab.li52:
When registering in the affiliate program, the partner automatically subscribes to the newsletter
«Affiliate program news». If necessary, the partner may refuse this
subscriptions in the «Profile» section in your affiliate account.
conditionsTab.li53:
These conditions can be changed unilaterally without notifying program participants, but with
posting on this page.

promo.title: Promo materials
promo.text_1: An advertising text with a link that you will place on Your website, blogs, forums, question and answer services, social networks, bookmark services will lead users to BestChange.ru , and you will receive a guaranteed reward for user clicks.
promo.text_2: Below are the main options for advertising materials with your affiliate link. You can use any link texts or use ours. You just need to copy the selected code to your website and start making money.
promo.partnerLinkHTML: Affiliate link in HTML code (for posting on websites and blogs)
promo.partnerLinkHTMLHidden: Hidden affiliate link in the HTML code (it is not visible that the link is affiliate)

error.title: Error
error.404: The requested page was not found.
error.checkAddressOrGoTo: Check the address or go to

manual.title: Manual exchange
manual.description: The exchange office operates in manual or semi-automatic mode.

juridical.title: Transfers from a legal entity
juridical.description: The exchange office makes transfers using the details of a legal entity or sole proprietor.

verifying.title: Document verification
verifying.description: The client may be required to verify his identity (using identity documents).

cardVerify.title: Card verification
cardVerify.description: The client may be required to verify the card (confirmation that the card belongs to the client).

reg.title: Registration is required
reg.description: To create an exchange application, registration on the exchange office’s website is definitely required.

card2card.title: Card acceptance by Card2Card transfer
card2card.description: The exchange office accepts funds from users by direct transfer from the client’s card to the exchange office card (C2C), instead of receiving through card processing, which is assumed for destinations with Visa/MasterCard currencies by default. The client may be charged additional fees in accordance with the tariffs of the sending party’s bank.

floating.title: Floating exchange rate
floating.description: The exchange rate is fixed only when the client`s funds arrive at the exchange office.

hold.title: Hold when accepting funds
hold.description: The exchange may be delayed. Delay time: xx min, where xx is the delay time.

otherIn.title: Acceptance to a third-party payment system
otherIn.description: The payment system corresponding to the currency given by the client differs from the payment system to which the exchange office accepts payment.

otherOut.title: Payment from a third-party payment system
otherOut.description: The payment system corresponding to the currency sent to the client differs from the payment system with which the exchange office makes the payment.

purse.title: For wallet services
purse.description: An online wallet type service with a built-in exchange office function.

delivery.title: There is no office in the specified city
delivery.description: The exchange office does not have an office in the selected city, the courier delivery payment is included in the exchange rate or displayed by the «Additional commission» label

percent.title: Additional fees
percent.description: It can include up to 3 types of additional commissions that affect the final exchange rate

forExchangers.title: For exchangers
forExchangers.exportFileMarkdown: Format of the export file of courses
forExchangers.addToMonitoring: Conditions for adding an exchange office in the BestChange monitoring
forExchangers.rulesForExchangers: Rules for already added exchange offices in monitoring
